description: **Current Issues:** - RAG searches scan entire knowledge bases on each query - No indexing on `numbered_items.json` lookups - LightRAG storage may not be optimized for concurrent access **Optimizations:** - Pre-build inverted indices for numbered items during KB ingestion - Implement vector index caching (keep frequently-used embeddings in memory) - Add bloom filters for quick negative lookups before expensive RAG operations - Use memory-mapped files for large vector stores
